narrative.narrative: New Central Airservice is a Japanese airline based at Chofu Airport in Chofu, which is a city that makes up part of the Tokyo Metropolis, and lies about 20 kilometers to the west of downtown Tokyo. It was founded on December 15th,1978 and as of 2016 is serving 4 routes from Chofu. All these routes are to islands in the Izu Islands chain that spread south of Tokyo and Tokyo Bay. These islands are Izu Oshima,Miyakeshima,Niijima and Kozushima. From Chofu these range from between exactly 100 kilometers to 177 kilometers away. At August 2014 it had four Dornier 228-212's. It also used to use two BN Islanders.
